input.text: Awo eizaalibwa gwe olasimba kulamusizzaako ne nkwebaza gyonna gy'otuuseeko. Olunaku z'omwezi olunaku olwaleero ziri abiri mu mwenda, omwezi ogw'okusatu. Tukujjukiza nti buli lwa Sunday okuva ssaawa bbiri okutuuka ssaawa ssatu ez'akawungeezi tubeera ne program muvubuka weeyogerere nga esasulibwa aba Naggutini Center era nga tukujjukiza  nti buli Sunday esembayo mmwezi tugenda mu bavubuka ne tufuna ebirowoozo byabwe ebyenjawulo. Ngo olunaku olwareero tugenda tutunuulira embuto mu bavubaka buvunaanyizibwa. nzibwa bwanyi bwa balenzi bwa bawala. kufunamu ebirungi tusaba Mukama abatwalire mu ngeri eyo mweyongera okufunamu n'ebirungi. Amannya nze alafatika bwo okuva ku Lnaggutinage Center nga mbalamusako olunaku olwawero. Nabavubuka abazza olunaku olwarero okukubaganya ebirowooza namwe mbalamusizzako. Ng'obulange obwammwe okuva ennangulu bwensokerako bagamba nti avubuka buli alyeyo okuva ku myaka kkumi paka ku 24. Tukwaniriza ku Lnagggutinage wali ebugoloozi mu maaso g'essundiro ly'amafuta erya Shell. Tukubiriza ojye ofune obujanjabo obwerereere. Obujanja bwe buno buta yonna om okuvva mu kujjanjaba endwadde ezabulijjo no gamba nti olubuto lukuluma oba musujja muto gukuluma okutusiza ddala okujjanjaba edwadde ezileeta obukaba oba oziva mu kwegatta gamba nti we gasenemu nno nga tukozesa kapiira ate gwe wegasse naye alina endwadde ezo ezobukaba so mu ngeri eyo bwoba obufunye tukubiriza gonvu kali eyo gy'ofuna obujanjabi bubwa bwabwerere todeeyo n'ogenda waggya n'akunogera omujanja guyinza obutako kukoleka. over. over. over.  Kale, oba wosalawo okulonda gy'onazaalira tukugamba komawo funne n'ekyebayita post natal care oba care gyebawa omuntu ng'amaze okuzaala. Tukola n'ekye bayita family planning w'oba oli eyo nga gw'oyagala kutegeka zaddyo eryo oba kutegeka obulamu obwo obwa mu maaso we munabeera mu kikwatagana n'okuzaala ogy'ennagulu ne tukola counselling n'oweelonderawo n'omusawo family planning ki gy'onaakozesa oba nteekateeka ki gy'ona kozesa kyetuyita smart choice gwe gy'okuba bulungu n'emisango gy'omuzi.
